name: Charlie (gigifran)
description:
Charlie is a 3D puzzle game created in Unreal Engine 4. It was made in 3 weeks on a 5 person team. Charlie is about a robot with time rewinding abilities who is stuck at a time travel testing facility after an apocalyptic event.

Use W,A,S,D to move Charlie and a mouse to move the camera.

Space: Jump

E: Interact

F: Reverse Time

Q: Slow Time beginning at Level 2

Giselle Francis: Writer, Voice of Rachel

Ian Chamberlain: Programmer

Michael Dewey: Programmer

Ian Travis: Artist

Kevin Donovan: Level Designer

Bryce Miller: Voice of Adam
